title: Apple officially adds Bluetooth 4.2 support to iPhone 6, 6 Plus & iPad Air 2
text:
Apple officially adds Bluetooth 4.2 support to iPhone 6, 6 Plus & iPad Air 2 
Published By: AppleInsider.com - Today 
In announcing Bluetooth 4.2 support for iPhone 6s, iPad Pro and iPad mini 4 last month, Apple published product comparison charts suggesting... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
